item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "The man with no imagination has no wings." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Inside of a ring or out, ain't nothing wrong with going down. It's staying down that's wrong." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion'." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "You lose nothing when fighting for a cause ... In my mind the losers are those who don't have a cause they care about." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it - then I can achieve it." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Zaheer add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss
